sentence.Network_en: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
It has been said that art is a tryst , for in the joy of it maker and beholder meet.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人说艺术是一种幽会, 因为艺术家和欣赏者可在幽会的乐趣中相遇在一起.

sentence.Network_en: Personally I don't think he's very attractive, but they say beauty's in the eye of the beholder, don't they?
sentence.Network_cn: 我个人认为他并没有多大的魅力, 不过人人都说萝卜青菜,各有所爱, 不是 吗 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 【最新】GRE单词(红宝书)TXT完全版 - 豆丁网 ... begrudge v. 吝啬，勉强给 beholder n. 目睹者，旁观者 behoove v. 理应，有义务.
西方妖怪大百科 - 停留的风的日志 - 网易博客 ... Behemoth（ 贝希摩斯） Beholder（ 巨眼怪） Bendith（ 班迪斯）.
眼魔（Beholder）就是一种非常具有原创性的现代怪物。如果查一般英文字典，「beholder」这个字的字源是「behold」（观察）， …
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... BehnRorschach Test 贝罗测验 beholder 观看者 being 存在.

list.abs: In the distance , I behold colorful ads and steaming cars , with jazz faintly heard ., 在距离 , 我注视五颜六色的 ads 和蒸汽车 , 与爵士乐微弱地听见.
and the people behold something extraordinary ., 于是人们见到一种不同寻常的景象.
A normal beholder can become a wizard or sorcerer ., 正常的眼魔都可以成为法师或术士.
watching their heroes in South Africa , they will also behold themselves : sadder and a wiser people than they were four years ago ;欣赏他们的英雄在南非的表演的同时，他们也会关注自身：相比四年前更加忧伤却也更加理智。

entry.def: If you say that something such as beauty or art is in the eye of the beholder, you mean that it is a matter of personal opinion.

example.ex: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.

entry.def: The beholder of something is the person who is looking at it.

example.ex: The caves cannot but inspire wonder in the beholder.
example.tran: 这些洞穴让观者无不叹为观止。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who becomes aware (of things or events) through the senses

auth_sentence.content: Porn is a perception in the mind of the beholder!
auth_sentence.res_content: Porn is a perception in the mind of the beholder!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Porn is a perception in the mind of the beholder!

auth_sentence.content: I happen to think that alcoholism is in the liver of the beholder.
auth_sentence.res_content: I happen to think that alcoholism is in the liver of the beholder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I happen to think that alcoholism is in the liver of the beholder.

auth_sentence.content: In this case, beauty truly is in the eye of the beholder.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this case, beauty truly is in the eye of the beholder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this case, beauty truly is in the eye of the beholder.

sentences.en: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
Personally I don’t think he’s very attractive, but they say beauty’s in the eye of the beholder, don’t they?
sentences.cn: 我个人认为他并没有多大的魅力,不过人人都说萝卜青菜,各有所爱,不是吗?
